 1995-03051995-02-270,  ,  TB,  CITIZENSHIP,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the IMMIGRATION REGULATIONS, 1978 which allow the Minister to make loans to cover the costs associated with landing fees where the immigrant requires such assistance and to promote greater financial and administrative consistency within the current loans program.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1995-0121 Publication Date: 1995-03-22
Attachments
precis:
Amendments to the IMMIGRATION REGULATIONS, 1978 which allow the Minister
to make loans to cover the costs associated with landing fees where the
immigrant requires such assistance and to promote greater financial and
administrative consistency within the current loans program.
